## Edit idea

Reference the existing idea so we can update `ideas.json` correctly.

### Which idea?

- **Slug or title** (from the ideas board or [ideas.json](https://github.com/ummahbuild/ideas/blob/main/ideas.json)):

### What to change

Describe the change (e.g. “Add category Ramadan”, “Fix typo in description”, “Add requirement: Offline mode”).

### Proposed change (optional)

If editing a specific field, suggest the new value:

| Field         | Current (if known) | Proposed |
|---------------|--------------------|----------|
| title         |                    |          |
| description   |                    |          |
| slug          |                    |          |
| status        |                    |          |
| categories    |                    |          |
| requirements  | (add/remove/change) |          |
| url           |                    |          |
| quality       |                    |          |

### Add/remove requirements (features)

- **Add:** (list new requirement lines)
- **Remove:** (list requirement text to remove)
- **Change:** (old → new)
